item.title: Reload Animation
item.dc:creator: EvilGoodGuy
item.description:
Hamguy:

[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]When you reload with any weapon and shoot while reloading. the gun will fire as soon as the reload animation is complete.

[COLOR=‘SandyBrown’]When you want to fire in a tight situation, you cant cancel out the reload animation to shoot until the reload animation is complete.

As far as I am aware, this is a gameplay feature, not a bug.

A dev will correct me if i am wrong, im sure.

I actually like this feature for the most part, except in some instances with the shotgun. But other than the shotgun, I never really found it an issue. But all in all it makes you use your weapon switch more wisely.
